name: Action
description:
An action performed by a direct agent and indirect participants upon a direct object. Optionally happens at a location with the help of an inanimate instrument. The execution of the action may produce a result. Specific action sub-type documentation specifies the exact expectation of each argument/role.

See also blog post and Actions overview document.
title: Action

fields.name: result
fields.title: result
fields.description: The result produced in the action. e.g. John wrote a book.

fields.name: actionStatus
fields.title: actionStatus
fields.description: Indicates the current disposition of the Action.

fields.name: target
fields.title: target
fields.description: Indicates a target EntryPoint for an Action.

fields.name: agent
fields.title: agent
fields.description: The direct performer or driver of the action (animate or inanimate). e.g. John wrote a book.

fields.name: startTime
fields.title: startTime
fields.description:
The startTime of something. For a reserved event or service (e.g. FoodEstablishmentReservation), the time that it is expected to start. For actions that span a period of time, when the action was performed. e.g. John wrote a book from January to December.

Note that Event uses startDate/endDate instead of startTime/endTime, even when describing dates with times. This situation may be clarified in future revisions.

fields.name: endTime
fields.title: endTime
fields.description:
The endTime of something. For a reserved event or service (e.g. FoodEstablishmentReservation), the time that it is expected to end. For actions that span a period of time, when the action was performed. e.g. John wrote a book from January to December.

Note that Event uses startDate/endDate instead of startTime/endTime, even when describing dates with times. This situation may be clarified in future revisions.

fields.name: instrument
fields.title: instrument
fields.description: The object that helped the agent perform the action. e.g. John wrote a book with a pen.

fields.name: participant
fields.title: participant
fields.description: Other co-agents that participated in the action indirectly. e.g. John wrote a book with Steve.

fields.name: object
fields.title: object
fields.description: The object upon which the action is carried out, whose state is kept intact or changed. Also known as the semantic roles patient, affected or undergoer (which change their state) or theme (which doesn't). e.g. John read a book.

fields.name: error
fields.title: error
fields.description: For failed actions, more information on the cause of the failure.

fields.name: location
fields.title: location
fields.description: The location of for example where the event is happening, an organization is located, or where an action takes place.
